nodes.text: Clan Tenau was a Mandalorian clan in existence around the time of the Mandalorian Civil War, a conflict of ideals waged between the radical and violent Death Watch, and the honorable Jaster Mereel's True Mandalorians, while the peace-favoring New Mandalorians stood apart. During the societal schism, members of Clan Tenau were divided, with each of the three factions garnering support from individual clan members.
Clan Tenau was first introduced to Star Wars canon in the 2012 reference book, The Essential Guide to Warfare, authored by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart.
